00041     : CSwordModuleInfo(module)

00049 void CSwordBookModuleInfo::printTree(TreeKeyIdx treeKey, TreeKeyIdx* target, int level ){
00050     if (!target)
00051         target = &treeKey;
00052 
00053 //  unsigned long currentOffset = target->getOffset();
00054   for (int i = 0; i < level; i++)
00055     cout << "    ";
00056   cout << treeKey.getLocalName() << endl;
00057   if (treeKey.firstChild()) {
00058     printTree(treeKey, target, level+1);
00059     treeKey.parent();
00060   }
00061   if (treeKey.nextSibling())
00062         printTree(treeKey, target, level);
00063 }
00064 
00065 const int CSwordBookModuleInfo::depth() {
00066     if (m_depth == -1) {
00067     TreeKeyIdx* treeKey = tree();
00068     if (treeKey) {
00069         TreeKeyIdx root = *treeKey;
00070         root.root();
00071             computeDepth(root, treeKey, 0);
00072         }
00073     }
00074     return m_depth;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void CSwordBookModuleInfo::computeDepth(TreeKeyIdx treeKey, TreeKeyIdx* target, int level ){
00078     if (!target)
00079         target = &treeKey;
00080 
00081     if (level > m_depth)
00082         m_depth = level;
00083 
00084   if (treeKey.firstChild()) {
00085     computeDepth(treeKey, target, level+1);
00086     treeKey.parent();
00087   }
00088   if (treeKey.nextSibling())
00089         computeDepth(treeKey, target, level);
00090 
00091 }
00092 
00094 TreeKeyIdx* const  CSwordBookModuleInfo::tree() const {
00095     TreeKeyIdx* treeKey = dynamic_cast<TreeKeyIdx*>((SWKey*)*(module()));
00096     if (treeKey)
00097         return treeKey;
00098     return 0;
00099 }
